parsing_result:
# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

## DYNAMIC RANGE
Choose a dynamic range for movie recording.

| Option  | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| 100%    | See “DYNAMIC RANGE” (p. 113). |
| 200%    | See “DYNAMIC RANGE” (p. 113). |
| 400%    | See “DYNAMIC RANGE” (p. 113). |

- **AUTO** (automatic dynamic range control) is not available during movie recording.
  - **200%** is available at sensitivities from ISO 320 to ISO 12800.
  - **400%** at sensitivities from ISO 640 to 12800.
  - The **MOVIE SETTING > DYNAMIC RANGE** option is available when **OFF** is selected for **MOVIE SETTING > F-Log RECORDING**.

## TONE CURVE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (p. 114).

## COLOR
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (p. 115).
